headline: Biogen (BIIB): Reassessing Valuation After a Recent 3-Month Share Price Rebound
summary: Biogen (BIIB) has quietly outperformed the market over the past 3 months, with shares up about 20%. This performance has put the stock back on investor radars after a stretch of weaker multi year returns. See our latest analysis for Biogen. That 19.6% 3 month share price return stands out against a still modest 14.7% year to date share price gain and a disappointing 3 year total shareholder return of around negative 40%. This suggests sentiment has only recently started to warm up again. If...
